bioghist.p: Materials compiled by Charles F. Shower of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. He lived in Carlisle, Pennsylvania, for a number of years.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of genealogical research on the Shower family and allied families such as Allen, Davies, Dutton, Edwards, Kittera and Smith. Materials include family charts, notes, extracts from primary and published sources, correspondence related to the research (some preservation photocopied), and photocopies of newspaper clippings. There are some personal letters and family papers.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
